member.name: M:WhatTheFlock.Util.ComputeBestFitLine(System.Collections.Generic.List{WhatTheFlock.Triple},WhatTheFlock.Triple@,WhatTheFlock.Triple@,System.Single)
member.summary: Compute the line that best fit a set of input points (least squared orthogonal distance)
member.param: The input points
Origin of the best fit line
Direction of the best fit line
The tolerance that is used the determined if the input points are coincidental, collinear, or non-collinear
member.returns: 0 if the input points are coincidental; 1 if they are collinear; 2 otherwise

member.name: M:WhatTheFlock.Util.ComputeBestFitPlane(System.Collections.Generic.List{WhatTheFlock.Triple},WhatTheFlock.Triple@,WhatTheFlock.Triple@,System.Single)
member.summary: Compute the plane that best fit a set of input points (least squared orthogonal distance)
member.param: The input points
Origin of the best fit plane
Normal of the best fit plane
The tolerance that is used the determined if the input points are coincidental, collinear, coplanar, or non-coplanar
member.returns: 0 if the input points are coincidental; 1 if they are collinear; 2 if they are coplanar; 3 otherwise

member.name: M:WhatTheFlock.Util.ComputeBestFitCircle(System.Collections.Generic.List{WhatTheFlock.Triple},WhatTheFlock.Triple@,WhatTheFlock.Triple@,System.Single@,System.Single)
member.summary: Approximate the circle that best fit a set of input points
member.param: The input points
Center of the best fit circle
Normal of the best fit circle
Radius of the best fit circle
The tolerance that is used the determined if the input points are coincidental, collinear, or non-collinear
member.returns: False if the input points are coincidental or collinear; True otherwise

member.name: M:WhatTheFlock.Util.ComputeBestFitSphere(System.Collections.Generic.List{WhatTheFlock.Triple},WhatTheFlock.Triple@,System.Single@,System.Single)
member.summary: Compute the sphere that best fit a set of input points (least squared orthogonal distance)
member.param: The input points
Center of the best fit sphere
Radius of the best fit sphere
The tolerance that is used the determined if the input points are coincidental, collinear, coplanar, or non-coplanar
member.returns: False if the input points are coincidental, collinear or coplanar; True otherwise

member.param: The flocking simulation engine
The number of agents to be created for simulation, with random initial positions and directions (this input will be ignored if agentInitialPositions input is not-null)
The initial positions of the agents. If null. The positions will be created randomly
The initial directions of the agents. If null. The directions will be created randomly
